2.title: Instructions
2.content:
Your task

In the following experiment, you will see two white boxes on either side of the screen. Every task starts with a white plus sign between them, as shown below. Please focus on this plus. After a moment, a white X will appear in one of the two boxes. Your task will be to press the space bar as soon as this happens, but no earlier. Please be as quick as you can, but make sure not to press space beforehand.

Shortly before the X is shown, an arrow will replace the plus sign, giving you a hint on which side it might appear. However, this hint will not always be correct — it will be right in about 8 of 10 cases.

Here's what the task will look like:

First, you'll see a cross in the center of the screen.
This indicates that the task is about to start.
Please focus on it at this point.

Next, you'll receive a hint as to where the target will appear.
Remember that this isn't always accurate.

Finally, the target x will appear on either side of the screen.
Please press the space bar as soon as you see it!

Please click the continue button below to practice this task.

6.title: Thank you
6.content:
The experiment is now complete. Thank you!

You may now close this window

rows.title: Change body color and remove borders

7.title: Start Practice
7.content:
Press the space bar to start the practice trials.

Remember to keep your focus on the fixation cross in the screen center, and to press the space bar as soon as the X appears.

content.text:
Please make sure to respond
only after the X appears.

Please make sure to respond
only after the X appears.

rows.title: Change body color and remove borders

24.title: Start Experiment
24.content:
You've now completed the practice trials.

Remember to keep your focus on the fixation cross in the screen center, and to press the spacebar as soon as the X appears.

Please press the space bar to start the experiment.
